title: Draft Sandwich Props, Maurice Jones-Drew & Kayvon Thibodeaux
itunes:title: Draft Sandwich Props, Maurice Jones-Drew & Kayvon Thibodeaux
description:
A room filled to the brim with heroes- Dan Hanzus, Marc Sessler and Gregg Rosenthal give their 2022 Draft Sandwich Props and they really hang some onions. THE best player in Jaguars history, MJD, joins the show to talk about what he thinks the Jags will do with the first overall pick. Draft prospect Kayvon Thibodeaux surprises the heroes and tells them that he doesn't want to be friends. The heroes break some big news at the end of the show.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
